article.name: Learner Support: Download or Print Your Training Certificate
article.title: Learner Support: Download or Print Your Training Certificate
article.body:
After you have completed your assigned training content, you will receive a training certificate. If you forget to print or download your certificate after you complete your training, you can still download or print your certificate as long as the campaign is still open. However, if the campaign is closed, you'll need to contact your admin, who can provide you with a copy of the certificate.

To download or print your training certificate, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your KnowBe4 account.
  2. Select the Training tab at the top of the page.
  3. From your list of training, find the training content that you would like to download a certificate for.
    Note:For Arabic certificates, the content title and duration will display in English.
  4. Click Download Certificate. The certificate will be localized into your selected training language automatically.
    Note:If you are required to read and acknowledge a URL policy with your training, the Download Certificate button will not display until you have read and acknowledged the policy.

When you click Download Certificate, your certificate will open in a new tab in your browser. From this tab, you can view, download, or print your certificate. If you experience any issues with viewing, downloading, or printing your certificate, please contact your account admin for assistance.

Note:Certificates are available for completed training content only. You will not receive a certificate for acknowledging internal policies that your organization has assigned to you.

The tile graphic depicts a hand signing a document with a dollar sign, signifying financial compliance or anti-fraud measures. An orange status flag overlays the top-left corner bearing the text **"Completed"**. The footer contains icons indicating academic content (graduation cap) and video availability.

**Right Panel (Course Details and Actions):**
1.  **Primary Actions:** Two links are positioned above the title.
    *   A primary button, highlighted with an orange border, reads: **"Download Certificate"** (preceded by a download arrow icon).
    *   A secondary link reads: **"View Details"** (preceded by a magnifying glass icon).
2.  **Course Title:** The main header text is **"Anti-Fraud (See Something, Say Something)"**.
3.  **Status/Review:** A gray button below the title reads **"Review"**.
4.  **Metadata:**
    *   A language selector shows the active setting: **"English (United States)"**.
    *   A subtext line provides context: **"Anti-Corruption Laws (2022 Annual Compliance)"**.
